job_description:
AWS Architect

Job Summary:

We are seeking a skilled AWS Architect to design, implement, and optimize secure, scalable, and cost-efficient cloud solutions on Amazon Web Services (AWS). The ideal candidate will have deep technical expertise in AWS architecture, cloud-native design, and DevOps practices, with a strong ability to translate business requirements into robust technical solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and architect cloud solutions leveraging AWS services such as EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, ECS, EKS, and CloudFormation.
  • Define and implement cloud architecture best practices, security standards, and governance frameworks.
  • Lead cloud migration initiatives, including application modernization, containerization, and re-platforming strategies.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams (DevOps, Security, Data, and Application teams) to deliver scalable and resilient cloud systems.
  • Automate deployment and infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform or AWS CloudFormation.
  • Optimize cloud performance, cost, and resource utilization through monitoring and tuning.
  • Ensure compliance with security, risk, and data protection policies across all cloud environments.
  • Stay current with emerging AWS technologies and recommend innovative solutions for continuous improvement.
  • Provide technical leadership and mentorship to engineers and developers within the team.

Required Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent practical experience).
  • 5+ years of experience in cloud architecture, with at least 3 years focused on AWS.
  • Proven experience designing and implementing enterprise-scale AWS solutions.
  • Hands-on experience with networking, storage, compute, and security services on AWS.
  • Proficiency in DevOps tools and practices (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Strong knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools (Terraform, CloudFormation, CDK).
  • Experience in monitoring and observability (CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, etc.).
  • AWS Certification (AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional) is highly preferred.

Preferred Skills:

  • Familiarity with multi-cloud or hybrid-cloud environments.
  • Knowledge of serverless architectures and event-driven design.
  • Experience with data architecture and analytics services (Redshift, Glue, Athena).
  • Strong problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at remya.ps@pagematics.in
summary: Seeking an AWS Architect to design and implement secure, scalable cloud solutions. Requires 5+ years of experience in AWS architecture and DevOps practices.

job_description:
SAP BW Consultant at Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Job Published: 31, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 07, Nov 2025

Introduction

We are looking for candidates with 7+ years of experience for this SAP BW Consultant role.

Job Description

We are seeking an experienced SAP BW Consultant with a robust background in ABAP development, ECC extractors, and SAP HANA. The ideal candidate will have experience in designing, developing, and implementing SAP BW solutions and BI reporting. A sound understanding of the retail business domain, with desirable knowledge of BW/MM/SD SAP modules and data warehousing concepts & dimensional modeling, is essential.

Responsibilities:

  • Understand existing design and implementation of BW data models (InfoProviders, DSO/ADSOs, CompositeProviders, MultiProviders, InfoCubes).
  • Document BW transformation rules, BEX formulas, and maintain documentation.
  • Integrate BW with front-end tools (BO, Analysis for Office, etc.).
  • Work with standard and custom ECC extractors (e.g., extractors 2LIS, 0FI, 0CO*).
  • Debug and troubleshoot data extraction and load issues.
  • Document ABAP routines in BW transformations.
  • Integrate data sources from non-SAP systems via BODS or SD.
  • Design and optimize data flows using BW/4HANA or embedded BW.

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills: - 7+ years of hands-on SAP BW development and support experience. - Proficiency in SAP ABAP skills. - Proven experience with ECC extractors (standard & custom) across SD, MM, FI, CO modules. - Strong understanding of SAP data dictionary objects, modules, and integration with other SAP modules. - Strong knowledge of data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes. - Experience with Process Chain, scheduling, and monitoring. - Strong knowledge of InfoProviders, InfoCubes, DSOs, and Query Design.

Secondary Skills: - Good analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to detail. - Effective communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams. - Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
  • SAP BW related certification or relevant SAP certifications are desirable but not mandatory.

Application Instructions:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Notice Regarding Fraudulent Job Offers: This is to notify jobseekers that some fraudsters are promising jobs with Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Please note that no payment is ever sought for jobs in Reflections. job_description:
Technical Project Manager (Application Development)

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 http://www.reflectionsglobal.com

Closing Date: 07, Nov 2025 Job Published: 31, Oct 2025 Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Brief Description

We are looking for a Technical Project Manager (Tech PM) with 13+ years of experience to lead the end-to-end execution of custom application development and integration projects. The role primarily focuses on projects built on .NET stacks with modern client frameworks and integration platforms. The ideal candidate will possess a strong technical foundation coupled with project delivery expertise, enabling them to drive complex, cross-functional initiatives from discovery through production rollout. This position requires hands-on experience across the entire software/product development lifecycle, including planning, estimation, design, development, testing, and release, while collaborating closely with engineering, product, and client stakeholders.

Job Description

  • Manage end-to-end delivery of custom software development and integration projects using Java, .NET, and related technologies.
  • Create and maintain project plans, define timelines, identify dependencies, and track progress.
  • Coordinate with cross-functional teams including developers, QA, UI/UX, and DevOps to ensure smooth execution.
  • Oversee all stages of the SDLC: requirements finalization, development, integration, testing (unit, system, UAT, NFR), and deployment.
  • Work closely with architects and leads to ensure alignment with technical direction and design.
  • Identify and manage risks, scope changes, and schedule adjustments proactively.
  • Serve as the primary point of contact for clients and stakeholders, providing regular updates and resolving issues.
  • Ensure quality and timely delivery through effective team coordination and clear communication.

Preferred Skills

Technical & Delivery Expertise

  • 13+ years of overall IT experience, with 4–6 years of Technical Project Management experience.
  • Strong understanding of custom application development on Java/.NET stacks.
  • Experience managing:
  • Backend/API development
  • Integration using tools like Apache Camel, IBM Integration Stack
  • Database interactions (Oracle, SQL Server)
  • Client-side development using React/Angular
  • Deployment on cloud platforms (AWS, Azure)
  • Familiarity with Microservices architecture, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps practices.

Project Management

  • Expertise in schedule planning, effort estimation, dependency tracking, and delivery monitoring.
  • Hands-on experience in scope and schedule change management, stakeholder communication, and issue escalation.
  • Tools: Jira, Confluence, MS Project, Git, Jenkins, or equivalent.

Secondary Skills

  • Experience managing globally distributed teams.
  • Strong understanding of enterprise-level integrations and technology ecosystems.

Soft Skills

  • Excellent communication and stakeholder engagement capabilities.
  • Strong leadership, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
  • Ability to articulate technical topics to both technical and non-technical audiences.

Important Notes for Applicants:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Job Scams Alert: Please be aware that some fraudsters may promise jobs with Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Reflections Info Systems never solicits payment for job opportunities. We contact candidates exclusively through our official website or LinkedIn, and all employment-related communications are sent from our official HR email address. For any clarification or alerts regarding this subject, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
